at least expanded in recent years into not only growing their online presence but also operating a pharmacy Center optical center Auto Center and more all conveniently within their warehouses too as well as online plus their subscription plans bring in steady uh recurring revenues for them which is Ni nice to have to and usually when people sign up for Costco they tend to keep those memberships for a long time and so I'm sure that this is a legacy retailer that can Outlast most smaller competitors thanks to that strong business however as long as Amazon is around I just can't find any reason particularly within Tech like cloud computing AI EVS video streaming music gaming and much more and as such Amazon is not only much larger doing more than double the sales of Costco but it's even growing at a much higher rate too and in fact it's at double the rate despite that gigantically larger size so I'm not really sure why black rock loves this one so much I mean the stock isn't even a great value either not only trading near a record high but also hundreds of percents more expensive than the sector median on a PE ratio basis so even though I like the business I just think that as long as I have Alternatives like Amazon to invest in Costco will continue to be of pretty much little to no interest for me and because of that it's going to get the last place ranking for now until I
